about_the_game:
Fly with Freedom:


Control Marvin, the cute-angry-evil potato, entirely with your mouse. Experience the freedom of flying and exploring the world just like in a Wii game, but on PC!

Epic Battles:


Engage in thrilling fights by smashing enemies with your mouse. Test your punches with challenging fights!

Interactive Environment:


Break through walls using Marvin's head and interact with the world around you. Even feel the weight of objects as you lift them, all controlled by your mouse.

Plenty of Mini-Games:


Enjoy a variety of mini-games designed to make the most of the mouse-only mechanics. In the demo, try your hand at some mini games that you won't see anywhere else like oiling pimp moustaches, dancing in a diss music video, and play some free game machines in the game room, and try to write your name to the top of the leaderboard!

Captivating Storyline:


Immerse yourself in a storyline told through dynamic cutscenes, each with a unique musical score. Meet absurd and colorful characters like Ice Cream the rapper, three pimps, a candy-addicted chicken, and Marvin himself, the cute evil potato on a quest for revenge. (Disclaimer: Ice Cream swears a lot.)

Emotional Rollercoaster:


Experience a range of emotions throughout the demo, from comedy and anger to annoyance and sadness.

How to Play?


Navigate with Ease: Move Marvin by simply moving your mouse.
Combat with a Swing: Swing your mouse quickly like a punch to deal damage to enemies.
Health Management: Be cautious—every hit you take reduces Marvin's health. Bump into walls, enemies, and objects carefully. Find armchairs to replenish health.
Power-Ups: Press the right mouse button to activate the power-ups you've collected.

Join Marvin on his unique adventure and experience a game like no other, designed to fully utilize mouse control for an engaging and immersive experience.

content_descriptors.notes: Profanity is used by some characters a lot.
